Title: 3 Idiots
Cast_stars: Aamir Khan, Madhavan, Mona Singh, Sharman Joshi
Plot_summary: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

Title: Taare Zameen Par
Cast_stars: Darsheel Safary, Aamir Khan, Tisca Chopra, Vipin Sharma
Plot_summary: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

Title: PK
Cast_stars: Aamir Khan, Anushka Sharma, Sanjay Dutt, Boman Irani
Plot_summary: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of religion on its people.

Title: Radhe
Cast_stars: Salman Khan, Disha Patani, Randeep Hooda, Jackie Shroff
Plot_summary: After taking the dreaded gangster Gani Bhai, ACP Rajveer Shikawat aka Radhe goes on a manhunt to find the wealthiest man of the town secretly running a crime syndicate.

Title: Dangal
Cast_stars: Aamir Khan, Sakshi Tanwar, Fatima Sana Shaikh, Sanya Malhotra
Plot_summary: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

Title: Dil Bechara
Cast_stars: Sushant Singh Rajput, Sanjana Sanghi, Sahil Vaid, Saswata Chatterjee
Plot_summary: The emotional journey of two hopelessly in love youngsters, a young girl, Kizie, suffering from cancer, and a boy, Manny, whom she meets at a support group.

Title: Rang De Basanti
Cast_stars: Aamir Khan, Soha Ali Khan, Siddharth, Sharman Joshi
Plot_summary: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.

Title: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
Cast_stars: Aamir Khan, Raghuvir Yadav, Gracy Singh, Rachel Shelley
Plot_summary: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

Title: My Name Is Khan
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Sheetal Menon, Katie A. Keane
Plot_summary: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President of the United States seriously and embarks on a cross-country journey.

Title: Sadak 2
Cast_stars: Priyanka Bose, Alia Bhatt, Sanjay Dutt, Aditya Roy Kapoor
Plot_summary: The film picks up where Sadak left off, revolving around the journey with a young girl who becomes an important character in the life of the protagonist, and the reason for him to stay alive.

Title: Shershaah
Cast_stars: Sidharth Malhotra, Kiara Advani, Shiv Panditt, Pranay Pachauri
Plot_summary: This is a story of a PVC awardee brave Indian soldier - Capt. Vikram Batra, who shot to fame and became a household name during the Kargil War in 1999. His indomitable spirit and his unflinching courage in chasing the Pakistani soldiers out of Indian territory contributed immensely in India finally winning the Kargil War in 1999.

Title: Gangs of Wasseypur
Cast_stars: Manoj Bajpayee, Richa Chadha, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tigmanshu Dhulia
Plot_summary: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

Title: Swades: We, the People
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Gayatri Joshi, Kishori Ballal, Smit Sheth
Plot_summary: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

Title: Andhadhun
Cast_stars: Ayushmann Khurrana, Tabu, Radhika Apte, Anil Dhawan
Plot_summary: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

Title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
Cast_stars: Salman Khan, Harshaali Malhotra, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Kareena Kapoor
Plot_summary: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.

Title: Barfi!
Cast_stars: Ranbir Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Ileana D'Cruz, Saurabh Shukla"
Plot_summary: Three young people learn that love can neither be defined nor contained by society's definition of normal and abnormal.

Title: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
Cast_stars: Sanjay Dutt, Arshad Warsi, Gracy Singh, Sunil Dutt
Plot_summary: A gangster sets out to fulfill his father's dream of becoming a doctor.

Title: Chak De! India
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Vidya Malvade, Sagarika Ghatge, Shilpa Shukla
Plot_summary: Kabir Khan, the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team, dreams of making his all-girls team emerge victorious against all odds.

Title: Drishyam
Cast_stars: Ajay Devgn, Shriya Saran, Tabu, Rajat Kapoor
Plot_summary: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

Title: A Wednesday
Cast_stars: Anupam Kher, Naseeruddin Shah, Virendra Saxena, Mahesh Kanual
Plot_summary: A retiring police officer reminisces about the most astounding day of his career. About a case that was never filed but continues to haunt him in his memories - the case of a man and a Wednesday.

Title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
Cast_stars: Hrithik Roshan, Farhan Akhtar, Abhay Deol, Katrina Kaif
Plot_summary: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

Title: Coolie No. 1
Cast_stars: Varun Dhawan, Sara Ali Khan, Paresh Rawal, Javed Jaffrey
Plot_summary: After being insulted by a rich businessman named Rosario, pandit Jai Kishen teaches him a lesson by getting his daughter married to Raju - a Coolie posing as a millionaire.

Title: Dil Chahta Hai
Cast_stars: Aamir Khan, Saif Ali Khan, Akshaye Khanna, Preity Zinta
Plot_summary: Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them - until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.

Title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Amrish Puri, Farida Jalal
Plot_summary: When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran moves to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its presence felt.

Title: Kal Ho Naa Ho
Cast_stars: Preity Zinta, Shah Rukh Khan, Saif Ali Khan, Jaya Bachchan
Plot_summary: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love for her.

Title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
Cast_stars: Farhan Akhtar, Sonam Kapoor, Pawan Malhotra, Art Malik
Plot_summary: The truth behind the ascension of Milkha Singh who was scarred because of the India-Pakistan partition.

Title: Queen
Cast_stars: Kangana Ranaut, Rajkummar Rao, Lisa Haydon, Jeffrey Ho
Plot_summary: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

Title: Hera Pheri
Cast_stars: Akshay Kumar, Sunil Shetty, Paresh Rawal, Tabu
Plot_summary: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

Title: Kahaani
Cast_stars: Vidya Balan, Parambrata Chattopadhyay, Indraneil Sengupta, Nawazuddin Siddiqui
Plot_summary: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she questions denies having ever met him.

Title: Gunday
Cast_stars: Ranveer Singh, Arjun Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Irrfan Khan
Plot_summary: The lives of Calcutta's most powerful Gunday, Bikram and Bala, changes when Nandita enters it. Then a counter-force takes charge and a thriller unfolds.

Title: Ghajini
Cast_stars: Aamir Khan, Asin Thottumkal, Jiah Khan, Pradeep Singh Rawat
Plot_summary: A short-term memory loss patient sets out on his journey to avenge the death of his beloved girl.

Title: Hotel Mumbai
Cast_stars: Dev Patel, Armie Hammer, Nazanin Boniadi, Anupam Kher
Plot_summary: The true story of the Taj Hotel terrorist attack in Mumbai. Hotel staff risk their lives to keep everyone safe as people make unthinkable sacrifices to protect themselves and their families.

Title: Laxmii
Cast_stars: Akshay Kumar, Kiara Advani, Sharad Kelkar, Ashwini Kalsekar
Plot_summary: Aasif visits his wife's parents' house and happens to go to a ground that is supposedly haunted. However, he is soon possessed by the spirit of a transgender who is out for revenge.

Title: Baby
Cast_stars: Akshay Kumar, Danny Denzongpa, Rana Daggubati, Taapsee Pannu
Plot_summary: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.

Title: Airlift
Cast_stars: Akshay Kumar, Nimrat Kaur, Kumud Mishra, Prakash Belawadi
Plot_summary: When Iraq invades Kuwait in August 1990, a callous Indian businessman becomes the spokesperson for more than 170,000 stranded countrymen.

Title: OMG: Oh My God!
Cast_stars: Paresh Rawal, Akshay Kumar, Mithun Chakraborty, Mahesh Manjrekar
Plot_summary: A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.

Title: Special Chabbis
Cast_stars: Akshay Kumar, Anupam Kher, Manoj Bajpayee, Jimmy Sheirgill
Plot_summary: A gang of con-men rob prominent rich businessmen and politicians by posing as C.B.I and income tax officers.

Title: Sholay
Cast_stars: Sanjeev Kumar, Dharmendra, Amitabh Bachchan, Amjad Khan
Plot_summary: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

Title: The White Tiger
Cast_stars: Adarsh Gourav, Rajkummar Rao, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Vedant Sinha
Plot_summary: An ambitious Indian driver uses his wit and cunning to escape from poverty and rise to the top. An epic journey based on the New York Times bestseller.

Title: The Lunchbox
Cast_stars: Irrfan Khan, Nimrat Kaur, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Lillete Dubey
Plot_summary: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life as they build a fantasy world together through notes in the lunchbox.

Title: Jab Tak Hai Jaan
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Katrina Kaif, Anushka Sharma, Anupam Kher
Plot_summary: A woman is made to realize that her prayers and sacrifice to save her boyfriend's life may have led him to a fate worse than death.

Title: Haider
Cast_stars: Shahid Kapoor, Tabu, Shraddha Kapoor, Kay Kay Menon
Plot_summary: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.

Title: Andaz Apna Apna
Cast_stars: Aamir Khan, Salman Khan, Raveena Tandon, Karisma Kapoor
Plot_summary: Two slackers competing for the affections of an heiress inadvertently become her protectors from an evil criminal.

Title: Chennai Express
Cast_stars: Deepika Padukone, Shah Rukh Khan, Sathyaraj, Nikitin Dheer
Plot_summary: A man heading towards Rameshwaram via Chennai express to immerse his late grandfather's ashes unwillingly gets caught amidst goons after helping their boss's daughter and them board the train.

Title: Don 2
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Florian Lukas, Om Puri, Priyanka Chopra Jonas
Plot_summary: Don turns himself in and escapes with Vardhaan from prison, following which he recruits a team to steal currency printing plates from a bank in Berlin.

Title: Veer-Zaara
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Preity Zinta, Rani Mukerji, Kirron Kher
Plot_summary: Veer-Zaara is a saga of love, separation, courage and sacrifice. A love story that is an inspiration and will remain a legend forever.

Title: Sanju
Cast_stars: Ranbir Kapoor, Paresh Rawal, Manisha Koirala, Vicky Kaushal
Plot_summary: Sanju is a biopic of the controversial life of actor Sanjay Dutt: his film career, jail sentence and personal life.

Title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
Cast_stars: Vicky Kaushal, Paresh Rawal, Mohit Raina, Yami Gautam
Plot_summary: Indian army special forces execute a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.

Title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Rani Mukerji, Sana Saeed
Plot_summary: During their college years, Anjali was in love with her best-friend Rahul, but he had eyes only for Tina. Years later, Rahul and the now-deceased Tina's eight-year-old daughter attempts to reunite her father and Anjali.

Title: Jab We Met
Cast_stars: Shahid Kapoor, Kareena Kapoor, Tarun Arora, Dara Singh
Plot_summary: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

Title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham...
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Amitabh Bachchan, Hrithik Roshan
Plot_summary: After marrying a poor woman, rich Rahul is disowned by his father and moves to London to build a new life. Years later, his now grown up little brother Rohan embarks on a mission to bring Rahul back home and reunite the family again.

Title: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
Cast_stars: Sushant Singh Rajput, Kiara Advani, Anupam Kher, Disha Patani
Plot_summary: The untold story of Mahendra Singh Dhoni's journey from ticket collector to trophy collector - the world-cup-winning captain of the Indian Cricket Team.

Title: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Anushka Sharma, Vinay Pathak, M.K. Raina
Plot_summary: A breathtaking, goose flesh igniting, awe inspiring love journey of an ordinary man Suri and his 'total opposite' love Taani.

Title: Lage Raho Munna Bhai
Cast_stars: Sanjay Dutt, Arshad Warsi, Vidya Balan, Boman Irani
Plot_summary: Munna Bhai embarks on a journey with Mahatma Gandhi in order to fight against a corrupt property dealer.

Title: Dhoom:3
Cast_stars: Aamir Khan, Katrina Kaif, Abhishek Bachchan, Uday Chopra
Plot_summary: When Sahir, a circus entertainer trained in magic and acrobatics, turns into a thief to take down a corrupt bank in Chicago that ruined his father, Indian officers Jai and Ali are called to catch him.

Title: Race 3
Cast_stars: Anil Kapoor, Salman Khan, Bobby Deol, Jacqueline Fernandez
Plot_summary: Relationships and loyalties of a criminal family planning its next big heist are tested when some shocking revelations strike them.

Title: Fan
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Carolina Main, Sayani Gupta, Shriya Pilgaonkar
Plot_summary: Gaurav develops an obsession with a movie star who looks just like him. He goes to Bombay to meet his idol, but he refuses to grant him five minutes of his time. Gaurav is enraged and plots to destroy his hero.

Title: Udaan
Cast_stars: Rajat Barmecha, Ronit Roy, Manjot Singh, Ram Kapoor
Plot_summary: Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.

Title: Sultan
Cast_stars: Salman Khan, Kubbra Sait, Anushka Sharma, Randeep Hooda
Plot_summary: Sultan is a classic underdog tale about a wrestler's journey, looking for a comeback by defeating all odds.

Title: Chhichhore
Cast_stars: Sushant Singh Rajput, Shraddha Kapoor, Varun Sharma, Prateik
Plot_summary: A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.

Title: Raees
Cast_stars: Raj Arjun, Shubham Chintamani, Shubham Tukaram, Yug
Plot_summary: A bootlegger sets out to improve his community as a promising leader but falls in a political trap.

Title: Pink
Cast_stars: Taapsee Pannu, Amitabh Bachchan, Kirti Kulhari, Andrea Tariang
Plot_summary: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

Title: Rockstar
Cast_stars: Ranbir Kapoor, Nargis Fakhri, Shammi Kapoor, Kumud Mishra
Plot_summary: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.

Title: Vicky Donor
Cast_stars: Ayushmann Khurrana, Yami Gautam, Annu Kapoor, Dolly Ahluwalia
Plot_summary: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

Title: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
Cast_stars: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone, Aditya Roy Kapoor, Kalki Koechlin
Plot_summary: Kabir and Naina bond during a trekking trip. Before Naina can express herself, Kabir leaves India to pursue his career. They meet again years later, but he still cherishes his dreams more than bonds.

Title: Om Shanti Om
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, Arjun Rampal, Kirron Kher
Plot_summary: In the 1970s, Om, an aspiring actor, is murdered, but is immediately reincarnated into the present day. He attempts to discover the mystery of his demise and find Shanti, the love of his previous life.

Title: Talaash
Cast_stars: Aamir Khan, Kareena Kapoor, Rani Mukerji, Nawazuddin Siddiqui
Plot_summary: Inspector Surjan Shekhawat, who is dealing with a depressing past, has to investigate a high profile murder case, deal with his crumbling marriage and use the help and solace of a prostitute by the name of Rosie.

Title: Devdas
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Madhuri Dixit, Jackie Shroff
Plot_summary: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.

Title: Ra.One
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Arjun Rampal, Kareena Kapoor, Shahana Goswami
Plot_summary: When the titular antagonist of an action game takes on physical form, it's only the game's less powerful protagonist who can save his creator's family.

Title: Dear Zindagi
Cast_stars: Alia Bhatt, Shah Rukh Khan, Kunal Kapoor, Priyanka Moodley
Plot_summary: Kaira is a budding cinematographer in search of a perfect life. Her encounter with Jug, an unconventional thinker, helps her gain a new perspective on life. She discovers that happiness is all about finding comfort in life's imperfections.

Title: Tumbbad
Crew_dir: s:Rahi Anil Barve, Anand Gandhi, Adesh Prasad
Cast_stars: Sohum Shah, Jyoti Malshe, Anita Date, Ronjini Chakraborty
Plot_summary: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

Title: Don
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Arjun Rampal, Isha Koppikar
Plot_summary: Vijay is recruited by a police officer to masquerade as his lookalike Don, the leader of an international gang of smugglers. Things go wrong when the officer is killed and Vijay is left to fend for himself.

Title: Happy New Year
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, Abhishek Bachchan, Anupam Kher
Plot_summary: A gang of amateur dancers takes part in a dancing competition to avenge their personal vendetta.

Title: Gully Boy
Cast_stars: Vijay Varma, Nakul Roshan Sahdev, Ranveer Singh, Vijay Raaz
Plot_summary: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

Title: Ludo
Cast_stars: Pankaj Tripathi, Abhishek Bachchan, Rajkummar Rao, Fatima Sana Shaikh
Plot_summary: From a resurfaced sex tape to a rogue suitcase of money, four wildly different stories overlap at the whims of fate, chance and one eccentric criminal.

Title: Kai po che!
Cast_stars: Amit Sadh, Sushant Singh Rajput, Rajkummar Rao, Amrita Puri
Plot_summary: Three friends growing up in India at the turn of the millennium set out to open a training academy to produce the country's next cricket stars.

Title: English Vinglish
Cast_stars: Sridevi, Adil Hussain, Mehdi Nebbou, Priya Anand
Plot_summary: A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter every day because of her inability to speak and understand English.

Title: Paan Singh Tomar
Cast_stars: Irrfan Khan, Mahie Gill, Rajesh Abhay, Hemendra Dandotiya
Plot_summary: The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

Title: Black
Cast_stars: Amitabh Bachchan, Rani Mukerji, Shernaz Patel, Ayesha Kapoor
Plot_summary: The cathartic tale of a young woman who can't see, hear or talk and the teacher who brings a ray of light into her dark world.

Title: Main Hoon Na
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Sushmita Sen, Sunil Shetty, Zayed Khan
Plot_summary: An army major goes undercover as a college student. His mission is both professional and personal: to protect his general's daughter from a radical militant, and to find his estranged half-brother.

Title: Gunjan Saxena: The Kargil Girl
Cast_stars: Janhvi Kapoor, Pankaj Tripathi, Angad Bedi, Manav Vij
Plot_summary: Inspired by the life of a fearless young officer who made history by becoming the first Indian female Air Force officer to fly in a combat zone during the 1999 Kargil War

Title: Toofaan
Cast_stars: Farhan Akhtar, Hussain Dalal, Imran Rashid, Vijay Raaz
Plot_summary: The story of a boxer and the struggles he faces on his journey to get to the national level competition.

Title: Talvar
Cast_stars: Irrfan Khan, Konkona Sen Sharma, Neeraj Kabi, Sohum Shah
Plot_summary: An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.

Title: Dilwale
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Varun Dhawan, Kriti Sanon
Plot_summary: The siblings of two estranged lovers fall for each other, unaware of the violent past that drove them apart.

Title: Bajirao Mastani
Cast_stars: Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Tanvi Azmi
Plot_summary: An account of the romance between the Maratha general, Baji Rao I and Mastani, princess of Bundelkhand.

Title: Anand
Cast_stars: Rajesh Khanna, Amitabh Bachchan, Sumita Sanyal, Ramesh Deo
Plot_summary: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the fullest before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.

Title: Ek Tha Tiger
Cast_stars: Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif, Girish Karnad, Roshan Seth
Plot_summary: India's top spy Tiger and his love Zoya battle the dark world of intelligence and espionage that forbids its soldiers from loving the enemy.

Title: Fanaa
Cast_stars: Aamir Khan, Kajol, Rishi Kapoor, Tabu
Plot_summary: A sweet blind girl Zooni meets a flirty Rehan. She ignores her friends' warnings. It's her time to discover life. Is she making the right love choice?

Title: Jodhaa Akbar
Cast_stars: Hrithik Roshan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Sonu Sood, Poonam Sinha
Plot_summary: A sixteenth century love story about a marriage of alliance that gave birth to true love between a great Mughal emperor, Akbar, and a Rajput princess, Jodha.

Title: Stree
Cast_stars: Rajkummar Rao, Shraddha Kapoor, Pankaj Tripathi, Aparshakti Khurana
Plot_summary: In the small town of Chanderi, the menfolk live in fear of an evil spirit named "Stree" who abducts men in the night. Based on the urban legend of "Nale Ba" that went viral in Karnataka in the 1990s.

Title: Dabangg
Cast_stars: Salman Khan, Sonakshi Sinha, Sonu Sood, Arbaaz Khan
Plot_summary: A corrupt police officer faces challenges from his family, gangsters and politicians.

Title: Badhaai ho
Cast_stars: Ayushmann Khurrana, Neena Gupta, Gajraj Rao, Sanya Malhotra
Plot_summary: A man is embarrassed when he finds out his mother is pregnant.

Title: Raanjhanaa
Cast_stars: Dhanush, Sonam Kapoor, Mohd. Zeeshan Ayyub, Swara Bhaskar
Plot_summary: Kundan, the son of a Hindu pundit, discovers that his childhood sweetheart Zoya loves city-bred Akram and wants to marry him. However, he persistently seeks to win her heart.

Title: Piku
Cast_stars: Deepika Padukone, Amitabh Bachchan, Irrfan Khan, Moushumi Chatterjee
Plot_summary: A quirky comedy about the relationship between a daughter and her aging father, whose eccentricities drive everyone crazy.

Title: Wake Up Sid
Cast_stars: Ranbir Kapoor, Konkona Sen Sharma, Supriya Pathak, Anupam Kher
Plot_summary: The story of a lazy Mumbai college student who does absolutely nothing, with a turn of events will Sid realize his potential in this world and become a success in the fast-paced life of Mumbai.

Title: Dev.D
Cast_stars: Abhay Deol, Mahie Gill, Kalki Koechlin, Dibyendu Bhattacharya
Plot_summary: After breaking up with his childhood sweetheart, a young man finds solace in drugs. Meanwhile, a teenage girl is caught in the world of prostitution. Will they be destroyed, or will they find redemption?

Title: Bharat
Cast_stars: Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif, Sunil Grover, Tabu
Plot_summary: At the cusp of India's birth as an Independent nation, a family makes an arduous journey to freedom at a cost. A young boy Bharat, makes a promise to his Father that he will keep his family together no matter what.

Title: Padmaavat
Cast_stars: Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh, Shahid Kapoor, Aditi Rao Hydari
Plot_summary: Set in medieval Rajasthan, Queen Padmavati is married to a noble king and they live in a prosperous fortress with their subjects until an ambitious Sultan hears of Padmavati's beauty and forms an obsessive love for the Queen of Mewar.

Title: Kabir Singh
Cast_stars: Shahid Kapoor, Kiara Advani, Nikita Dutta, Soham Majumdar
Plot_summary: An exalted but short-fused surgeon plunges into a spiral of drugs, alcohol and rage after his intense relationship with his girlfriend turbulently ends.

Title: Mimi
Cast_stars: Kriti Sanon, Evelyn Edwards, Pankaj Tripathi, Sai Tamhankar
Plot_summary: Mimi is introduced by Bhanu to an American couple as a surrogate in exchange for Rs 2 million. She decides to have the baby even when they change their mind and tells her parent that Bhanu is the father.

Title: Mohabbatein
Cast_stars: Amitabh Bachchan, Shah Rukh Khan, Uday Chopra, Jugal Hansraj
Plot_summary: A film about the battle between love and fear, between two stubborn men and their opposing beliefs and the outcome of the love stories of 3 couples.

Title: Aashiqui 2
Cast_stars: Aditya Roy Kapoor, Shraddha Kapoor, Shaad Randhawa, Salil Acharya
Plot_summary: Rahul loses his fans and fame due to alcoholism. But he then decides to turn a small time singer into a rising star.

Title: Kick
Cast_stars: Salman Khan, Jacqueline Fernandez, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Randeep Hooda
Plot_summary: An adrenaline junkie walks away from a whirlwind romance and embraces a new life as a thief, though he soon finds himself pursued by veteran police officer and engaged in a turf war with a local gangster.

Title: Dil Se..
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Manisha Koirala, Preity Zinta, Raghuvir Yadav
Plot_summary: A radio broadcaster's intense attraction to a mysterious woman opens the door to a tidal wave of powerful emotions and desires.

Title: Raazi
Cast_stars: Alia Bhatt, Vicky Kaushal, Rajit Kapoor, Shishir Sharma
Plot_summary: A Kashmiri woman agrees to marry a Pakistani army officer in order to spy on Pakistan during the Indo-Pakistan War of 1971.

Title: Highway
Cast_stars: Alia Bhatt, Randeep Hooda, Durgesh Kumar, Pradeep Nagar
Plot_summary: Right before her wedding, a young woman finds herself abducted and held for ransom. As the initial days pass, she begins to develop a strange bond with her kidnapper.

Title: Tanu Weds Manu Returns
Cast_stars: Kangana Ranaut, Madhavan, Jimmy Sheirgill, Deepak Dobriyal

Plot_summary: Nandan Kumar comes across a suitcase and discovers it is full of cash. He takes the suitcase and soon finds himself being chased by a notorious gangster, an honest cop and a minister, who want the suitcase at any cost.

Plot_summary: Four runaway crooks take shelter in a bungalow which is owned by a blind couple.

Plot_summary: Shruti and Bittoo become partners in their very own "Wedding planning ka bijness" in Delhi and in the process discover friendship, love and one another.

Plot_summary: The story of a young revolutionary who raised an armed resistance against the British rule in India.

Title: Mulk

Plot_summary: One family member tries to help her own family which are trapped in a dark controversy.

Title: Love Aaj Kal
Cast_stars: Saif Ali Khan, Deepika Padukone, Rishi Kapoor, Rahul Khanna
Plot_summary: An old-fashioned romantic tells his personal love story to a modern man who has just broken up with his girlfriend. Has love really ever changed?

Plot_summary: When his daughter decides to further her studies in London, a hardworking Rajasthani businessman does everything in power to make her dreams come true.

Title: Lootera
Cast_stars: Ranveer Singh, Sonakshi Sinha, Barun Chanda, Adil Hussain
Plot_summary: An aristocrat's daughter falls in love with a visiting archaeologist, but he holds a secret that could drive them apart.

Title: Border
Cast_stars: Sunny Deol, Sunil Shetty, Akshaye Khanna, Jackie Shroff
Plot_summary: In 1971, along the border region of Longewala, a small battalion of Indian soldiers goes up against a large Pakistani strike force.

Title: Company

Plot_summary: A small-time gangster named Chandu teams up with Malik, a low-level enforcer for a criminal syndicate. Together they eliminate all their enemies, becoming the most feared gangsters in Mumbai.

Title: Chalte Chalte

Plot_summary: A man pursues a woman who is already engaged and eventually gets married to her. Differences between the two lead to a bitter separation that threatens to destroy their relationship forever.

Plot_summary: A poor but big-hearted man takes orphans into his home. After discovering his scientist father's invisibility device, he rises to the occasion and fights to save his children and all of India from the clutches of a megalomaniac.

Title: The Big Bull
Cast_stars: Abhishek Bachchan, Nikita Dutta, Ileana D'Cruz, Sanjeev Pandey"
Plot_summary: The story of the film is based on real events of financial market that took place between 1990 and 2000 involving Harshad Mehta and his financial crimes.

Title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2
Cast_stars: Kartik Aaryan, Omkar Kapoor, Sunny Singh Nijjar, Nushrat Bharucha
Plot_summary: After falling in love, three roommates experience changes in their lives.

Title: Karwaan
Cast_stars: Irrfan Khan, Dulquer Salmaan, Mithila Palkar, Amala Akkineni

Title: Gulaal

Plot_summary: A law student witnesses deception, homicide, and crime after being elected as General Secretary of his college.

Title: Dhamaal

Plot_summary: An innocent man is embroiled in underworld after being falsely charged and sets out to punish the perpetrators who subjected his life to misery.

Title: Madaari

Plot_summary: A comedy of errors wherein four men help each other to fool their prospective father-in-laws creating a cascade of confusion and mayhem.

Title: Race

Plot_summary: A love triangle between a guy and two girls, who are best friends but the complete opposite of one another.

Title: Asoka
Cast_stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Kareena Kapoor, Danny Denzongpa, Hrishitaa Bhatt
Plot_summary: The epic tale of King Asoka's life is recounted.

Plot_summary: Believing himself to be jinxed, a man attempts to find true love, but instead gets caught in a web of lies.

Title: Vaastav: The Reality

Plot_summary: Consequences force an innocent man to get involved in crime after making an error.

Title: Bala

Title: Partner

Title: Johnny Gaddaar

Title: Ittefaq

Title: Baaghi 3

Plot_summary: A man embarks on a bloody rampage to save his kidnapped brother.

Title: Aamir
